StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeclinePendingNwaRequest]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaID int
AS BEGIN
declare @personid varchar(20) declare @NWACount INT
select @personid = marine_candidate_id from nwa where nwa_id = @NwaID select @NWACount = count(nwa_id) from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @personid
BEGIN TRANSACTION
delete from CANDIDATE_STATUS where nwa_id = @nwaid delete from CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_WAIVER where candidate_waiver_id in (select candidate_waiver_id from CANDIDATE_WAIVER where nwa_id = @nwaid) delete from CANDIDATE_WAIVER where nwa_id = @nwaid delete from NWA where nwa_id = @NWAID
IF (@NWACount = 1) BEGIN
delete from CANDIDATE_ADDRESS where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_ASVAB where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_COMMENT where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_COMMENT where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_EDUCATION where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_LANGUAGE where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from MARINE_CANDIDATE where marine_candidate_id = @personid delete from MARINE where marine_id = @personid delete from PERSON where person_id = @personid
END
IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION print 'ERROR DELETING SSN' END ELSE BEGIN COMMIT TRANSACTION print 'DELETION OF CANDIDATE COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY' END
END
